access.help: Use this command to enter user credentials for Maestro CLI

access_key.help: Access key associated with the Maestro user

secret_key.help: Secret key associated with access key specified in the command

path.help:
Path to the file where the user credentials will be stored. Should be used to store credentials for different Maestro environment, example DEV, QA, etc 
Stores in "./.default.cr" by default
